kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=gk, url=http://localhost:3001, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Post On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:3001/devel/db/geokrety/move/seed path_url=/devel/db/geokrety/move/seed headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.22.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded', 'Content-Length': '115'} body=gkid=1&move_type=0&author=1&waypoint=GC0001&lat=43.60000&lon=7.00000&comment=Hello&app=robotframework&app_ver=3.2.1

POST Response : url=http://localhost:3001/devel/db/geokrety/move/seed status=200, reason=OK headers={'Date': 'Tue, 13 Jul 2021 07:55:21 GMT', 'Server': 'Apache/2.4.38 (Debian)', 'X-Powered-By': 'Fat-Free Framework', 'Set-Cookie': 'PHPSESSID=acaccfcd34fc4464c8337ddf055b45cf; path=/; HttpOnly; SameSite=Lax', 'X-Frame-Options': 'SAMEORIGIN', 'X-XSS-Protection': '1; mode=block', 'X-Content-Type-Options': 'nosniff', 'Pragma': 'no-cache', 'Cache-Control': 'no-cache, no-store, must-revalidate', 'Expires': 'Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 +0000', 'Content-Length': '92', 'Keep-Alive': 'timeout=5, max=100', 'Connection': 'Keep-Alive', 'Content-Type': 'text'} body=Create move id:1 geokret:1 waypoint:GC0001 movetype:0 wpt:GC0001 lat:43.60000 lon:7.00000 OK
${resp} = <Response [200]>

kw.name: Request Should Be Successful
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is a client or server error (4xx, 5xx).
